add-plugin--description: install and configure plugins for a project
add-plugin--error-no-mgnl-config: The config file "mgnl.config.js" was not found. Create the file or jumpstart a project using: `npx mgnl jumpstart`.
add-plugin--error-no-package-json: The file "package.json" was not found. Create the file or jumpstart a project using: `npx mgnl jumpstart`.
add-plugin--error-installing-package:
An error occurred during package {{name}} installation:
{{errorMsg}}
add-plugin--error-cannot-verify-installa: Cannot verify that the package was installed, please install and add the plugin to mgnl.config.js manually.

Cannot verify that the package was installed, this happens when you are trying to add a new plugin from tarball, git URL, or HTTP URL, which is already installed. Please check your package.json add the plugin to mgnl.config.js manually.
add-plugin--error-cannot-parse-installed: Cannot parse package name, please add the plugin to mgnl.config.js manually.
add-plugin--error-multiple-new-deps: Multiple packages added, please check your package.json, install and add the plugin to mgnl.config.js manually.
add-plugin--error-modifying-mgnl-conf: Couldn't modify mgnl.config.js, please add the plugin to mgnl.config.js manually.
add-plugin--error-fix-className-fail:
Found another plugin with "{{className}}" in mgnl.config.js.
I tried to choose a new name, but failed.
Please check if your mgnl.config.js is correct, then install and add the plugin to mgnl.config.js manually.
add-plugin--error-package-json-parse: Cannot parse package.json file, please check if the file is correct or try to install and add the plugin to mgnl.config.js manually.
add-plugin--warn-cannot-get-plugins-clas:
Cannot determine plugin's class name.
Following name will be used: "{{className}}". Please change the plugin's import class name in mgnl.config.js manually.
add-plugin--warn-is-installed: It seems like that the package {{name}} is already installed. Please check your mgnl.config.js file and add the plugin manually if needed.
add-plugin--warn-using-other-className:
Found another plugin with "{{className}}" name in mgnl.config.js.
The new plugin will be imported as: {{newImportStr}}.
But, this may cause issues with the plugin.
Please check your mgnl.config.js file and rename the imports, the expected import is: {{importStr}}
add-plugin--info-plugin-exists: Plugin from {{pluginSource}} is already present in mgnl.config.js.
add-plugin--info-plugin-run-mgnl: Run `npm run mgnl` to see the list of registered commands.
